fields_of_interest: Trade, Education and training, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Food Safety
head_office_address: Monivong Boulevard, Sangkat Boeung Raing,, #254 Phnom Penh, Cambodia
eu_initiatives: Activities carried out with the objective of directly or indirectly influencing the formulation or implementation of policy and the decision-making processes of the EU institutions, irrespective of where they are undertaken and of the channel or medium of communication used.
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
membership: National Cleaner Production Office-Cambodia (NCPO-C) was established by acting as a focal point of UNIDO/UNEP international network of Resource Efficient and Cleaner Production (RECP) in sustaining RECP in the future by extending the activities to other sectors in the industrial field and other areas.
goals__remit: The NCPO-C will support the development of green manufacturing and trade promotion in Cambodia through the provision of value-adding services to businesses, governments and providers of business support services, technology and finance, to enable them to achieve implementation of RECP in a manner that is most beneficial to them, including improvement of their environmental performance, resource productivity, business performance and export and job potential.
